svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/26.2.15 Chrome/134.0.6998.205 Electron/35.2.1 Safari/537.36" version="26.2.15"> <diagram name="第 1 页" id="KhSOoDS3RUThKernwSb_"> <mxGraphModel dx="1028" dy="694" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="NC4d_ByihqaAGHFPi5xS-4" value="" style="group;movable=1;resizable=1;rotatable=1;deletable=1;editable=1;locked=0;connectable=1;" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="240" y="137.5" width="155" height="180" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="NC4d_ByihqaAGHFPi5xS-5" value="追击玩家" style="curved=1;startArrow=none;;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;rounded=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;movable=1;resizable=1;rotatable=1;deletable=1;editable=1;locked=0;connectable=1;" edge="1" as="sourcePoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="NC4d_ByihqaAGHFPi5xS-6" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;movable=1;resizable=1;rotatable=1;deletable=1;editable=1;locked=0;connectable=1;" </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="NC4d_ByihqaAGHFPi5xS-7" value="死亡<div>仇恨消失</div>" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=1;points=[];movable=1;rotatable=1;deletable=1;editable=1;locked=0;connectable=1;" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="NC4d_ByihqaAGHFPi5xS-6"> <mxGeometry x="-0.26" y="2" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="4" y="-13" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="NC4d_ByihqaAGHFPi5xS-8" value="追击状态" style="rounded=1;arcSize=20;strokeWidth=2;movable=1;resizable=1;rotatable=1;deletable=1;editable=1;locked=0;connectable=1;" vertex="1" parent="NC4d_ByihqaAGHFPi5xS-4"> <mxGeometry y="64.5" width="51" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="NC4d_ByihqaAGHFPi5xS-9" value="进入攻击范围" style="startArrow=none;;exitX=0.25;exitY=1;entryX=0.25;entryY=0;rounded=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;movable=1;resizable=1;rotatable=1;deletable=1;editable=1;locked=0;connectable=1;" </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="NC4d_ByihqaAGHFPi5xS-10" value="玩家脱离范围" style="startArrow=none;;exitX=0.75;exitY=0;entryX=0.75;entryY=1;rounded=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;movable=1;resizable=1;rotatable=1;deletable=1;editable=1;locked=0;connectable=1;" </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="NC4d_ByihqaAGHFPi5xS-11" value="攻击状态" style="rounded=1;arcSize=20;strokeWidth=2;movable=1;resizable=1;rotatable=1;deletable=1;editable=1;locked=0;connectable=1;" y="75" width="20" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 71px; margin-left: 145px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000; background-color: #ffffff;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); white-space: nowrap;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

ellipse.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
